Address.label: Address
Address.value: 22 QUEEN STREET,WINDSOR PLACE, 3RD FLOOR, HAMILTON, HM JX, Bermuda

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Enstar Group Ltd is a (re)insurance group that offers capital release solutions through its network of group companies. It seeks to create value by managing (re)insurance companies and portfolios of (re)insurance and other liability business in run-off and striving to generate an attractive risk-adjusted return from its investment portfolio. Its operations through four reportable segments: Run-off, Enhanzed Re, Investments, and Legacy Underwriting.
